searchDocs.title: CompilationOptions​
searchDocs.content: </> type CompilationOptions = { optLevel?: number, debugLevel?: number, typeInfoLevel?: number, coverageLevel?: number } Options for compiling Luau source code. Default compilation options from LuauCeption: Name Default Value optLevel 1 debugLevel 1 typeInfoLevel 0 coverageLevel 0

searchDocs.title: compile​
searchDocs.content: </> Main.compile( source: string,-- The Luau source code to compile. chunkname: string?,-- The name of the chunk (for error messages). Defaults to the source code if not provided. options: CompilationOptions?-- Options for compiling the source code. ) → buffer-- The compiled Luau bytecode. Compiles Luau source code into bytecode. See CompilationOptions for default compilation options.

searchDocs.title: loadBytecode​
searchDocs.content: </> Main.loadBytecode( bytecode: buffer | string,-- The Luau bytecode to load. chunkname: string?,-- The name of the chunk (for error messages). Defaults to (main) if not provided. env: {[string]: any}?,-- The environment to execute the code in. Defaults to the caller's environment. executionOptions: VMSettings?-- Options for executing the bytecode. You will likely not need to use this. ) → ( (...any) → ...any, () → () )-- The loaded chunk and the stop function. Loads Luau bytecode as a callable function. Returns the loaded chunk as a function, and a stop function that guarantees execution of the chunk will halt when called.

searchDocs.title: execute​
searchDocs.content: </> Main.execute( source: buffer | string,-- The Luau source code or bytecode to execute. chunkname: string?,-- The name of the chunk (for error messages). Defaults to (main) if not provided. env: {[string]: any}?,-- The environment to execute the code in. Defaults to the caller's environment. compilationOptions: CompilationOptions?,-- Options for compiling the source code (if source is a string). executionOptions: VMSettings?-- Options for executing the bytecode. You will likely not need to use this. ) → ...any-- The result of executing the chunk. Unless it has an explicit return, this will be nil. Executes Luau bytecode or source code. If the source is a string, it will be compiled first using the compilation options, if provided. See CompilationOptions for default compilation options.
